title: missing ip
body: I'm missing 1000 ip this has happen to e before and it cameback after a while but its not coming back now

replies.body: No worries! I went ahead and performed a quick IP Sync to make sure you're seeing the correct values on your end. The next time you log in you'll be able to see the right IP values.

its still has not given me the ip but its ok 
I appreciate the effort ill just play and earn some more.
I hate to ask this on someone else's thread, but would you mind doing an IP sync for me as well?
